functions.tag: {CustomModelData:7,display:{Name:'{"translate":"魔を弾く弓","color":"#211674","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(VI)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"闇威の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"魔弾の射手が持っているとされる呪われた弓","color":"#FF0000","italic":false}','{"translate":"使用者に絶大な力を与える代わりに破滅に誘うと伝えられている","color":"#FF0000","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"H","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" ピアッシングエイム"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"闇威",Tier:6},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"狩人",SkillID:330,Name:"ピアッシングエイム",Level:1,Interval:0,Trigger:"弓を構えて矢を撃つ",Count:666},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.44d,Operation:2,UUID:[I;11,0,0,12],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.44d,Operation:2,UUID:[I;11,0,0,22],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.movement_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.3d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,31],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:80d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.25d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,51],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.44d,Operation:2,UUID:[I;11,0,0,62],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-0.44d,Operation:2,UUID:[I;11,0,0,72],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
